entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `dotnet add package` does not recognize `requireLicenseAcceptance` #48273
  • `dotnet tool install` does not recognize `requireLicenseAcceptance` #48272
  • Change the default Windows SDK version #48263
  • Diagnostics for package directive #48262
  • Statement completion for package IDs and versions for package directives #48261
  • Simplify restoring the workload manifest msi in the VMR build #48252
    10.0.1xx
  • Cleanup 'dotnet run file' artifacts #48250

Closed

  • Better error message for missing workloads? #21956
  • dotnet workload commands that fail leave the sdk in a bad state #21953
  • Freestyle Jenkins msBuild command #21893
  • MSBuildSdkResolver sometimes uses 32-bit SDK paths in VS 2022 #21765
  • .net 6 sdk rc1 - Nuget Credentials Provider plugin not being used properly #21690
  • Are there any known issues regarding dotnet pack in combination with azure devops? #4282
  • VersionSuffix (or --version-suffix) ignored if PackageVersion or Version set #38698
  • Add `--format json` option to `dotnet new install` #47958
  • Keep working directory clean in `dotnet run file.cs` #48172
    10.0.1xx
  • Custom metadata on framework references is ignored when a NuGet package references the same assembly #1443
    Backlog
  • dotnet pack on maccatalyst with Release config misconfigures search path for files #48041

PullRequests

Created

  • Update the sign check to remove the exclusions but only check on sign… #48275
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • .NET Source-Build 9.0.105 April 2025 Updates #48274
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'release/9.0.2xx' #48271
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0.1xx #48269
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0.3xx #48268
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0.4xx #48267
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/9.0.1xx #48266
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/9.0.2xx #48265
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Make 'dotnet run file' tests runnable on localized machines #48264
    untriaged, Area-run-file
  • Encode images in ImageBuilder via Encoder Fixes #47399 #48255
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #48253
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • dotnet test for MTP: Support TestTfmsInParallel #48246
    Area-dotnet test, untriaged

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'release/9.0.1xx' #48149
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • dotnet CLI: Rename source files for consistency #48234
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Add workloads build #47225
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Delete src/SourceBuild/patches/aspire/0001-Only-add-msi-in-Signing.patch #48258
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Exclude dotnet*.js files from signing-validation #48233
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use global temp directory for run file outputs #48169
    untriaged, Area-run-file
  • Sign and harden pkgs #47996
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Re-Bootstrap Source Build to .NET 10.0.100-preview.4.25203.1 #48226
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [GitHub Actions] Add synchronize Event #48245
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove `testfx` from VMR source mappings #48225
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix productCommit(.txt|.json) content in VMR #48249
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.3xx' => 'main' #48235
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.2xx' => 'release/9.0.3xx' #48236
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #48248
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #48154
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #48203
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'release/9.0.2xx' #48151
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.2xx' => 'release/9.0.3xx' #48185
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • `dotnet package list` command should restore first #47873
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • tool install/update: Support package@version syntax #48085
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [ApiDiff] Implementation of the new ApiDiff that reuses GenAPI features #46425
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Remove unnecessary CA2022 suppressions #47904
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Move in-vertical manifest merging to new arcade package #47881
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use Roslyn to parse directives in file-based programs #47978
    untriaged, Area-run-file
  • Use Roslyn from SDK always for SDK-based project builds #48028
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Select the NativeAOT runtime pack as the target package when it's provided as part of the KnownILCompilerPack metadata #46611
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
